headline: Axon (AXON) Margin Decline Counters Strong Growth Narrative Despite Large One-Off Gain
summary: Axon Enterprise (AXON) reported 11.3% earnings growth over the past year, a significant slowdown compared to its five-year average of 59.9% per year. Profit margins slipped to 13.6%, down from 16.2% last year, and recent results were boosted by a one-off gain of $197.6 million. Looking forward, strong growth forecasts and the company’s history of robust profit increases remain key rewards for investors. However, current metrics highlight pressure on profitability and valuation. See our full...
